title: Fruit of the Loom Ankle Socks for Men - 8 Pairs - Arch Support, Cushioned, Athletic Quarter Socks - Mens Socks Size 6-12
description: Comfortable Fit: Breathable mesh and arch support provide a snug, comfortable fit for all-day wear while the rib-knit cuffs keep the socks from slipping down
Breathability for Active Lifestyles: The breathable mesh fabric keeps feet cool and dry during workouts or active days to prevent overheating, blisters, and odors
Cushioned Support: A cushioned sole absorbs impact and provides support with every step to keep feet feeling fresh all day long
Durability for Value: An ultra-soft polyester blend fabric is built to withstand regular washings without losing shape, color or comfort over time
Convenient 8-Pack: Get a full week's worth of comfortable athletic socks conveniently packaged together in one affordable set

These athletic ankle socks from Fruit of the Loom are the perfect choice for any active lifestyle. Featuring breathable mesh and arch support, they keep feet cool and comfortable whether you're working out or just on the go. The set includes 8 pairs of socks crafted from an ultra-soft polyester blend that feels great on feet. With rib-knit cuffs that stay put above the ankle, each pair is designed to stay in place during any activity. A cushioned sole in each sock absorbs impact too. Versatile enough for the gym or everyday wear, this 8-pack will keep you covered with a fresh pair anytime you need. At a great value for the quantity included, it's an easy choice for stocking your sock drawer.
